sentences.en: A transcript and audio of the segment are available online.
sentences.cn: 网上提供节目的文字和声音.

sentences.en: A transcript of the tapes was presented as evidence in court.
sentences.cn: 一份录音带的文字本作为证据被呈交法庭.

sentences.en: A transcript of this PBS programme is available through our website, pbs.com.
sentences.cn: 这个公共广播公司节目的文字本可通过我们的网址查阅。

sentences.en: Because the transcript is still under seal, I am precluded by law from discussing the evidence.
sentences.cn: 副本仍未公开，按照法律规定我不能讨论这项证据。

sentences.en: Did you bring your transcript from high school?
sentences.cn: 你把高中的成绩单带来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dissenting opinions in the deliberations must be truthfully entered in the transcript.
sentences.cn: 评议中的不同意见,必须如实记入笔录.

sentences.en: Finally, the transcript does not carry inflections of voice and body language.
sentences.cn: 最后, 记录手本其实不反映声音和肢体语言.

sentences.en: Have a copy of your high school transcript or resume at hand.
sentences.cn: 准备一份你高中的资料和个人履历.

sentences.en: I have it all in transcript and edited.
sentences.cn: 这些我都已经记下来并整理出来了.

sentences.en: I intend to read the transcript carefully and consider other action later.
sentences.cn: 我要仔细阅读记录然后考虑采取行动.

sentences.en: The immediate transcript of a t RNA gene is known as precursor tRNA.
sentences.cn: tRNA基因的直接转录物叫做tRNA前体.

sentences.en: The transcript is full of codewords, which is standard practice in any army.
sentences.cn: 抄本上全是密码，这种做法是所有军队的惯例。

sentences.en: They wouldn't let me have a transcript of the interview.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝给我一份采访的文字整理稿。

sentences.en: Transcript listing courses and grades will be sent on request.
sentences.cn: 如需要各科成绩单当即寄上.

sentences.en: We don't know how the transcript leaked.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道文字本是怎么泄露出去的。

words.tran_cn: （美）直接根据录音打字的打字员
成绩单；抄本，副本；文字记录

phrases.tran_cn: 官方的学生成绩单；官方成绩单

trans.tran_cn: 抄本，誊本，打印本，学生成绩报告单
trans.tran_en: a written or printed copy of a speech, conversation etc
